description:
Configuration schema for Convex project settings.

Documentation: https://docs.convex.dev/production/project-configuration#convexjson

node.description: Node.js specific configuration for server-side packages and dependencies.

externalPackages.description:
List of packages that should be installed on the server instead of being bundled. Use this for packages that can't be bundled or need to be installed directly on the server.

You can use '*' to mark all dependencies as external.

generateCommonJSApi.description: When true, generates CommonJS-compatible API files for projects using require().

functions.description: Path to the directory containing Convex functions.
